masutils.update.success: Mod update version %s has been downloaded successfully! It will take effect after game restart
masutils.update.available: Newer version of mod is available: %s
masutils.config.title: MasUtils Configuration (version: %s)
masutils.config.general.skyblockJoin.@To: Join skyblock after connecting to Hypixel
After joining skyblock executes warp to this location
masutils.config.general.updateNotificati: Send notifications when new version of mod is released
masutils.config.general.updateAction.@To: What to do when newer version has found
masutils.config.general.updateChannel.@T: Channel to search for versions. Main channel is the most stable, while alpha and beta have more modern features.
masutils.config.general.masterSwitch.@To: Enable or disable all mod features
masutils.config.mineshaft.toggle.@Toolti: You can fully disable all features of this category
masutils.config.mineshaft.corpseFinder.@: Create ESPs to all corpses in a mineshaft
masutils.config.mineshaft.profitHint.@To: When enter mineshaft send you a profit hint with calculations based on your stats and gear
masutils.config.mineshaft.esp.traceThick: Thickness of the waypoint trace line
masutils.config.mineshaft.party.mode.@To: You can enable or disable party mode
masutils.config.mineshaft.party.autowarp: Automatically warp your party when you entered mineshaft
masutils.config.mineshaft.party.autotran: Automatically transfer party leadership to who spawned mineshaft
masutils.config.mineshaft.party.messageo: Can be used for compatibility with another mods, you can send !pt in party chat
masutils.config.mineshaft.esp.toggle.@To: Mineshaft waypoint helps you to faster find a spawned mineshaft
masutils.config.mineshaft.esp.color.@Too: Color with which ESP will be created
masutils.config.nucleusRuns.jungleTemple: Automatically create waypoint for Jungle Temple Armadillo cheese
masutils.config.dev.debug.@Tooltip: Enable debug logging and additional information
masutils.config.dev.telemetry.@Tooltip: Telemetry sends non-sensitive information about your system and mod configuration to api server for future improvement
masutils.config.dev.collectErrors.@Toolt: Send exceptions and errors which happens with mod to api server. Helps dev to fix them.
masutils.config.qol.blockHeadPlacement.@: When use items like Abiphone block minecraft head placement for better visual experience
Disable particles at render stage (before GPU calculations), increases FPS and improves visual experience in dungeons
masutils.config.qol.potatoMode.@Tooltip: Texture of all mobs changes to color boxes, remove armor rendering. Removes fake name tags and fake mobs. Increases FPS and add casual visual experience. Works only in dungeons!
Hide damage amount indication on mob hit. Works only in dungeons!
masutils.config.qol.hideEffectsOverlay.@: Hide annoying and useless vanilla effects overlay
masutils.config.dungeons.starMobs.@Toolt: Highlight all starred mobs in dungeons
masutils.config.dungeons.doKick.@Tooltip: Kick player if he doesnt meet requirements, if disabled then just notify about it
Specify minimal bank balance in format like 1b or 100m
masutils.config.dungeons.requireTerminat: Require Terminator only for Archer class
masutils.config.dungeons.maxPB.@Tooltip: Enter time in format 5m30s or 300 (for seconds) or 5m
masutils.config.dungeons.notifyMode.@Too: Notify party, kicked user or just you about kicking reason
masutils.mineshaft.hint: You have entered mineshaft of type: %s
masutils.mining.grottoFinder.found: Found %s at chunk (%d, %d) - Panes: %d, Blocks: %d (%d chunks)
masutils.mining.grottoFinder.renderHint: Hint: Reduce your render distance to 10 (server limit) for scanning speed up
masutils.config.crystalHollowsFinder.gro: Scans world and shows you waypoints for fairy grottos
masutils.config.crystalHollowsFinder.los: Scan world in crystal hollows for lost visitors: Xalx, Three Bears and Chunk
masutils.dungeons.lowComps: Low completions on floor %s (%d less than required %d)
